meanings.sent1: The equiangular triangle had three equal angles.
meanings.sent2: The equiangular shape of the star made it easy to draw.
meanings.sent3: The equiangular room layout made it challenging to fit in all the furniture.
meanings.sent4: Her equiangular thinking allowed her to see all perspectives clearly.
meanings.sent5: The equiangular design of the garden created a harmonious balance.

meanings.definition: A polygon with all angles equal.
meanings.sent1: The equiangular was a unique shape in the geometry lesson.
meanings.sent2: The equiangular of the figure made it easy to calculate the missing angles.
meanings.sent3: The equiangular in the puzzle was the key to solving it.
meanings.sent4: The equiangular of the diamond symbolized perfection.
meanings.sent5: The equiangular of the playground structure ensured safety for all children.
